resources.string:
What\'s new with Field Nation

In an effort to move closer to the completion of the work order details redesign, we\'ve moved the primary action button into the toolbar for easy access and added a more menu for all secondary actions. From the more menu, you can now print a work order, report a problem, decline a work order, and rate buyer.

What we added:
  • A more menu with secondary actions for the work order
  • Printing options from work order details
What we changed:
  • Moved the primary action to the toolbar
  • Removed all tabs at the top of the work order
  • Moved messages to the toolbar
  • Updated the messages look and feel
Bugs we fixed:
  • Crashes on profile photos
  • Crashes with work order data and offline mode
